{{Description|A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.}}
'''Scholar's Clock''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Scholar]].

==Description==
A delicate clock placed carefully on the scholar's desk.<br />Spending days and nights in her study, the scholar lost all sense of time.<br />This exquisite clock served as a beacon guiding the scholar in her relentless pursuit of knowledge.<br />The time the scholar spent would prove to be fruitful.<br />Knowledge would find its way to her.
